name: Kill or Befriend
description:
Hello, Player!

You are going to enter the Dungeon! There you will have to fight for your life with monstrous creatures. You have a sharp sword which will help you to cut your way out through your enemies. However you also posses a magic wand which you can use to turn your enemies into allies who will fight for you.  Which way will you go?

The creators of this game is small team of IT students and this is part of our bachelor thesis. We strongly encourage you to select option "Make test" before playing this game. You will be presented with set of 30 psychological questions. Then enjoy the game. We need this data, as our goal is to determine connection between test results and the way in which you are playing the game. We are researching if there is some relation between how people are playing games and what they are like personally. Your participation in our study will be an ineffable help for us!
